amendment.description: To require a report to Congress regarding Federal acquisitions of American-made products.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 2066 withdrawn in Senate.
Amendment SA 2066 proposed by Senator Feingold. (consideration: CR S13886-13889; text: CR S13886-13887) To require a report to Congress regarding Federal acquisitions of American-made products.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2066 proposed by Senator Feingold.
